slide-1.title: How to Play
content: Ceme 7,8,9 is a game where you predict which player has a higher total card value than the banker.

slide-2.title: How to Play
content: You can bet on Player 1, 2, or 3. You can also place a side bet on the players for numbers 7, 8, 9, or a combination of 7, 8, 9 to get a much higher payout!

slide-3.title: Hokky Numbers
content: At certain times, Hokky Numbers will appear with double the normal payout! Hokky Numbers only appear on side bets for one of the Players.
